20110113020321.000|20110113020323.000|CC1|SCRIPTURE TELLS US THAT THERE IS

20110113020739.000|20110113020743.000|CC1|ARE DOING RIGHT BY OUR CHILDREN

20110113020751.000|20110113020754.000|CC1|WE ARE REMINDED THAT IN THE     
20110113020754.000|20110113020756.000|CC1|FLEETING TIME WE HAVE ON THIS

20110113020759.000|20110113020804.000|CC1|OR STATUS OR POWER OR FAME, BUT 
20110113020804.000|20110113020808.000|CC1|RATHER HOW WELL WE HAVE LOVED   
20110113020808.000|20110113020809.000|CC1|AND WHAT SMALL PART WE HAVE

20110113020811.000|20110113020825.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE BETTER.

20110113021506.000|20110113021510.000|CC1|NATION'S FUTURE.                
20110113021510.000|20110113021511.000|CC1|SHE HAD BEEN ELECTED TO HER
